headline: DTE Energy Board of Directors declares quarterly dividend
summary: Company continues more than 100-year history of issuing cash dividendDetroit, Dec. 03, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- (NYSE: DTE) — The DTE Energy Board of Directors declared a $1.09 per share dividend on its common stock payable Jan. 15, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business Dec. 16, 2024.
